title: Getting started guide
content:
This guide provides an introduction to OpenProject, covering initial steps such as signing in, registration, creating projects, inviting members, and working with various features like work packages, Gantt charts, and agile boards. It also details how to configure account settings and utilize the "My page" dashboard.

The guide includes a 3-minute introduction video and a comprehensive product introduction video to demonstrate both traditional and agile project management within OpenProject.

For further assistance, users can find help through documentation feedback, product feedback, community forums, professional support, or by contributing to the documentation and suggesting new features.

The page also provides links to various other documentation sections, including:
User guides for all features
FAQs
Use Cases
Glossary of project management terms
Enterprise edition guide
Project management guide
Security & privacy information
Contributions guide
System admin guide
Release Notes
BIM Guide
Installation and operations guide
Development information
API documentation

Popular topics covered include installing OpenProject, Enterprise add-ons, OpenProject hosting, and support options.
